SEARCH
Module brickGame
Package brickGame.Model.GameElements

Class GameBall

java.lang.Object
brickGame.Model.GameElements.GameBall
public class GameBall extends Object
Represents the game ball in this game. This class has coordinates, movement direction, and methods to update its position.
